Reviews.Title: “discusting, awful, old, dirty, cold and expensive”
Reviews.Author: ElizabethJTL
Reviews.Content: walked backwards mt company booked water toilet ran didnt heating didnt hotel brought electric fan cleaning lady walked corridor hole carpet hotel dont select hotel

Reviews.Title: “convenient.”
Reviews.Author: palustrian
Reviews.Content: ive actually stayed twice recommendation girlfriend hated depressed standards catching flight gatwick airport hotel cheap location near victoria station found breakfast price hotel worn bathroom shared convenient nights stay altho girlfriend

Reviews.Title: “Rooms small and slightly dirty, but great location”
Reviews.Author: agoodley
Reviews.Content: partner locked ourselves flat sunday track hotel busy period despite checking 1012 hotels availability pros cons pros 1 cheap paid 40 pounds 2 location door victoria station name suggests 3 free breakfast fancy eggs cereal 4 found helpful cons 1 ours tiny double bed instead king 2 en suite bathroom 3 dilapidation overall run rickety true leg bed bugs 40 pounds london decent nights sleep wouldnt stay 12 nights

HotelInfo.Name: Victoria Station Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 278 - 280 Vauxhall Bridge Road, London, England
